message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I believe you'll love it!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we meet at $10500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $10500. Would you be willing to consider $9800?
I'm still confident that we can find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $10800?
I'm still very interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $9500. I'd like to offer you a $200 bonus if you accept this price. Would you be willing to consider it?
I appreciate the bonus offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you at $10200, but I'm not adding any extra incentives. This is my final compromise.
I understand that you've made a final compromise, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9200?
I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to meet you at the minimum price I'm willing to sell for. How about we meet at $10000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $10000, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9000?
